name: WackyAdventureGameOrSomething
description:
A Small Point and Click Adventure Game made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021

You are Mantorston Jamesstonson! You just got a new mansion as a gift and it's your first time checking it out. But, then, everything goes wrong! (dramatization, it's actually quite relaxed)

Xanashea - Artwork

Stegoratops - Terrible Jokes, Programming, Music, Artwork
